TEXT: Please call Stella.  Ask her to bring these things with her from the store:  Six spoons of fresh snow peas, five thick slabs of blue cheese, and maybe a snack for her brother Bob.  We also need a small plastic snake and a big toy frog for the kids.  She can scoop these things into three red bags, and we will go meet her Wednesday at the train station.

TRANSCRIPTION: p ə l iː s k ɔː l s t ɛ l ɐ æ s k j ɔːɹ t ʊ b ɹ ɪ ŋ ð iː z θ ɪ ŋ k s w ɪ z h oʊ ɹ f ɹ ʌ m ð ə s t oʊ ɹ s ɪ k s p uː n s oʊ f ɔːɹ ɹ ɐ ʃ n oʊ l p iː z f aɪ v s k s s l eɪ p s ʌ v b l uː tʃ iː z æ n d m eɪ b i ɐ s n eɪ k f ɔːɹ x ɜː b ɹ ʌ ð ɚ b oʊ b w iː ɔː l s oʊ n iː t ɐ s m ɔː l p l æ s t ɪ k s n eɪ k æ n d b ɪ k t oʊ f ɔːɹ f ɹ oʊ k f ɔːɹ z ə k iː z ʃ ɪ k æ n s k uː p z ɪ s s ɪ n k s ɪ n t ʊ s ɹ iː ɹ ɛ t b ɛ k s æ n d iː ɪ l ɡ oʊ m iː t h ɪɹ w ɛ n z d eɪ æ t ð ə t ɹ eɪ n s t eɪ ʃ ə n
